projects.title: BioFormer
projects.description: Developing a novel architecture (BioFormer) for gene expression modelling. It combines the encodings from scGPT with the EvoFormer module from AlphaFold 2. BioFormer can reason on both sequence-based and pair representations of RNA expression values, effectively capturing gene interactions. Endgoal is a foundation model for single-cell omics data

projects.title: Gooper
projects.description: Building a search engine for influencers. Gooper v1 online now!

projects.title: Fundamental Matrix Estimation
projects.description: Python implementation of the eight-point algorithm to estimate the fundamental matrix given two views of the same scene.

projects.title: Single View Metrology
projects.description: Algorithm to estimate a person's height given a reference height in the scene.

projects.title: Information Retrieval
projects.description: An algorithm to retrieve the most appropriate answer to a given prompt.

projects.title: Wordle Solver
projects.description: A program to find the optimal best guess in the popular online game Worlde. It achieved an accuracy of 100% and an average of 2.91 words used to guess, with a running time of 0.5s.

projects.title: Image Compression via IP
projects.description: Pipeline to compress images using K-means clustering optimized via Integer Programming (IP).

projects.title: Resilient Companies
projects.description: We analyzed financial data from 31,710 Indian companies to classify them based on their performance compared to industry averages. We identified resilient companies, which showed consistent strong performance before and after 2020. This is the first step toward a greater projects whose goal is to determine the cause of the observed phenomenon and determine the impact of information systems in such resilience.

projects.title: SCIP Debugging
projects.description: Used gdb and AFL++ to discover and fix 2 bugs in the open source project SCIP, used to solve LP problems.

projects.title: Boolean Compiler
projects.description: A compiler for a boolean programming language.

projects.title: Bachelor of Science Thesis
projects.description: My thesis, titled "Exploring Transcriptional Interactions and Language Models for Single Cell RNA-seq Masked Value Prediction", focused on advancing scGPT, a state-of-the-art transformer model for gene expression modeling. Under the supervision of Prof. Francesca Buffa, I proposed and implemented key modifications to incorporate biological knowledge of transcriptional regulation, significantly improving the model's accuracy.

projects.title: Evolving Tinder
projects.description: I addressed the limitations of the Deferred Acceptance Algorithm by employing an evolutionary approach to achieve a more balanced and stable matching between two sets of individuals with subjective preferences.

projects.title: Q-Learning Playground
projects.description: I created an online playground to let everybody appreciate the beauty of the Bellman Equation and the remarkable effectiveness of a simple Q-learning algorithm.

projects.title: Daily Spin Bot
projects.description: Program to automate SNAI Daily Spin and maximize the reward. The .exe is available at the link below.

projects.title: Standardization
projects.description: We investigated how standardization in customer support influences customer satisfaction. Our analytical approach includes OLS regression as a baseline model, further extended to account for confounding variables, moderator and mediator effects, industry-specific trends and language patterns in responses.

projects.title: F1 Race Analysis
projects.tags: Python, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Data Mining
projects.description: Interactive application to display statistics and insights from the first ever to the most recent Formula 1 Grand Prix, automatically updated after each race.

projects.title: Production Function Estimation
projects.tags: R, Panel Data Analysis, FE/RE Model
projects.description: We applied Panel Data Analysis tools, such as the Fixed Effect (FE) and Random Effect (RE) models, to identify individual and time specific latent heterogeneity and provide a statistically relevant estimation of the production function of a firm.

projects.title: Words Generator
projects.description: I trained a collection of neural networks on different corpora of existing words to make them capable of generating novel, non-existent words possessing a striking resemblance to real ones.

projects.title: House Price Predictor
projects.tags: Python, Random Forest Regressor, Neural Network, Linear Regression
projects.description: I developed, trained and tested different machine learning models to predict house prices in Milan, Rome and Venice (45k +).

projects.title: Taylor Rule Estimation by OLS
projects.description: My group and I estimated Austria’s interest rate through the application of OLS Regression and the insights provided by Taylor’s rule. We performed diagnostic checks to ensure robustness and accuracy.
